News.Title: Voler Car: Secures New Contracts Post-Listing
News.Summary: Voler Car has secured two new service contracts after its recent listing. One with Motherson Air Travel Agencies Ltd for Bihar, expected to generate over ₹3 crores monthly, requiring 500 vehicles. Another with Teleperformance Global Business Private Ltd for Noida, projected to exceed ₹25 lakhs monthly revenue.

News.Title: Voler Car: Flat Listing at ₹90, Hits Lower Circuit Post-Debut
News.Summary: Voler Car shares listed at ₹90 on NSE SME, matching the IPO price band. The stock immediately hit the 5% lower circuit, dropping to ₹85.50 post-listing.

News.Title: Voler Car: IPO Shares Set for NSE SME Listing with Modest Grey Market Premium
News.Summary: Voler Car shares will be listed on the NSE SME platform today, February 19. The grey market premium indicates a 5% increase over the IPO price, suggesting moderate investor interest. The IPO was priced at Rs 85-90 per share and was oversubscribed 13.73 times.
